body_html:
I discussed this issue briefly with Martin Wicke on the mailing list: https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/#!topic/discuss/rOP4VKcfphg .

It seems that this use case is not supported OOB.

The ability to persistently load a model into memory for multiple predict calls would be a very useful enhancement.

body:
I discussed this issue briefly with Martin Wicke on the mailing list: https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/#!topic/discuss/rOP4VKcfphg .

It seems that this use case is not supported OOB. 

The ability to persistently load a model into memory for multiple predict calls would be a very useful enhancement.
